lines.text: I'm Charles Bernstein. Attorney for the late Milton Parker.
You mean someone else is late now?

[Georgie pushed the contents atop the safe onto Stuart]
Why did you do that?

[sobbing]
He was like a brother to me.
Montclair! Montclair! They have killed Montclair!
There, there, Babbette, we will get you another toilet.
Why that worm! What's he trying to prove? Georgie and I are his legitimate heirs. Why should we have to play some dumb game just to get what's rightfully ours? I'm going to contest this will!
That's the point, Mrs. Cruthers. This will is a contest.
We have been together for quite some time, now; I see no reason to discontinue the association?
Pie four ways is better than no pie at all.
Totally, completely, in every which way.
Yes, yes, because pie is my most favorite dessert.
Where we gonna find a toilet?
